creditline: Gift of funds from Elizabeth and Whitney MacMillan in honor of Patrick Noon and his curatorial contributions to the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description: standing winged male figure with long curly blonde hair, looking up toward ULC; sword in upraised PR hand--blade out of picture plane; blue breastplate; red cape; blue sandals with white cloth, gilt straps and red gems; figure stands on writhing, muscular nude male figure with brown hair and long fingers and fingernails
title: The Archangel Michael
